description: This course provides an overview of film studies by focusing on three areas: history of film, production (the basic tools of film-making), and theory (the basic vocabulary of film analysis). Students develop visual literacy through engagement with the primary structures, methods, practitioners, history, ideas, and vocabularies of film studies. Counts toward media studies concentration.
name: Intro to Film Studies
notes: Film screenings Monday evenings. This course has class-year limits

title: Introduction to Film Studies
